function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased household energy consumption due to remote work and lockdowns","Impact":"Higher energy bills, strain on existing energy infrastructure","Mitigation":"Developing additional green energy sources, promoting energy-saving practices","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Households, energy providers","Owner":"Energy companies, government"},{"Description":"Increased medical waste from single-use masks and gloves","Impact":"Environmental pollution, strain on waste management systems","Mitigation":"Promoting reusable masks, investing in medical waste management infrastructure","Technologies":"Waste recycling technologies, biodegradable materials","People":"Healthcare facilities, waste management companies","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, waste management companies"}]}
